column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I went here last night on a first date and it was the shiiii. My date heard about this from Yelp
column2: so WHAT UP YELP :) Lauren was our server
column3: and she was BALLER. Very honest
column6: and friendly - very cool. If you go
column7: Â I'd say order a bunch of different kinds of tapas - we got a scallop
column11: and it was so FUN! Didn't rush us at all
column13: I didn't feel like we were putting them out - and the sangria was delish. One little thing is that I drink a lot of water
column14: so the helpers could have kept up on that a little more
column15: for my taste. From start to finish
